word: Brother Burden, before closing my letter, I will finish what I intended to say about the building of the food factory. This work requires much wisdom and genuine good sense. If you can bring it about do so. Make the best possible use of "Ministry of Healing" to aid you in your work. I believe that (256) you can accomplish that which seems to be a necessity. I think that if we all walk humbly with God, we shall always have grateful hearts.
